channel.title: CVE Feed for RadiusTheme -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for RadiusTheme -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-46853|2024-08-03T14:39:38.625Z -- radiustheme -- the%20post%20grid
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in RadiusTheme The Post Grid plugin <= 5.0.4 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-37520|2024-08-02T03:57:39.464Z -- radiustheme -- shopbuilder%20%E2%80%93%20elementor%20woocommerce%20builder%20addons
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in RadiusTheme ShopBuilder – Elementor WooCommerce Builder Addons allows Path Traversal.This issue affects ShopBuilder – Elementor WooCommerce Builder Addons: from n/a through 2.1.12.

item.title: CVE-2024-35739|2024-08-02T03:14:53.997Z -- radiustheme -- the%20post%20grid
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in RadiusTheme The Post Grid allows Stored XSS.This issue affects The Post Grid: from n/a through 7.7.1.
